title: New top Shimano S-Phyre XC902 mountain bike shoe gets lighter, thinner, spikier!
content:
Shimano has just slipped out an SH-XC902 update to their top S-Phyre XC9 mountain bike shoes, calling them the “lightest ever”. Developed with the top cross-country and cyclocross pros like Mathieu van der Poel these new S-Phyre XC9s shed more than 10% of the previous version getting upgraded retention, more spike options, and grippier soles.
